definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: spread or lay something over (NH id. form a crust, so Hiph. [[יקרים על]] Sir 43:20; Aram. [[קְרַם]], qram, incrust, overlay);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. [[וְקָרַמְתִּ֫י עֲלֵיכֶם עוֹר]] Ez Eze 37:6 I will spread skin over you (i.e. the dry bones); Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּקְרַם עֲלֵיהֶם עוֹר]] v:Eze 37:8 (so Gi van d. H.; Baer [[וַיִּקְרָם]], of which conflicting explan. Ges:§ § 9 u, 29 i), indef. Subj. instead of pass.; but rd.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: [[וַיִּקָּ֫רֶם]] SyrVer (cf. Vulgate) Co Berthol Toy Krae.
